fullText:
Combat Commander

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, Warlord, Combat Leader class feature
Benefit: The bonus to initiative granted by your Combat Leader class feature is now equal to your Charisma modifier or your Intelligence modifier, whichever is higher.

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 202.
name: Combat Commander
